    • FundParticipationUnit

      public FundParticipationUnit(InvestmentFund invFund, float initialPrice, String marketName)
      Creates a fund participation unit.
      Parameters:
      invFund - The fund which will be assigned to a fund participation unit.
      initialPrice - Initial price of a unit.
      marketName - String representing the market name to which a unit will belong.
